backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with all app data types, book list, and imports for storage, authorization, and migration.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions mirroring backend state and a no-op migration run function returning the existing actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for redeploying the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment issues across install, backend, build, and runtime phases.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting meta tags, favicon, error handlers, and loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, error boundary, and root application structure.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive carousel for ambient sound selection with audio preview, swipe handling, volume control, and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Provides a React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed error screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays an error alert for cloud sync issues with contextual messaging and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Renders a slider-based duration selector with labeled min/max values and live value display.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Implements a floating sidebar navigation with icons, hover labels, and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Creates a mobile hamburger menu with theme toggle, authentication state display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Provides a dropdown UI for filtering journal entries by favorites, mood, energy, date, and text content.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Implements a swipeable and keyboard-navigable page viewer with animated transitions for knowledge content.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel component for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and button navigation and dynamic card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and displays results upon completion.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Animated particle system around the lotus that switches between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas animation rendering particles and a pulsing lotus graphic whose appearance varies by theme and variant.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel for navigating predefined meditation types using swipe or buttons with circular index logic and card scaling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper UI for meditation steps with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and parsing of content into main text and benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave progress, glow effects, and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component showing a circular fill-level indicator with animated waves and theme-based styling.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard and supports an optional callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper that renders a LotusCanvas background and places children above it.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes, with glow and wave effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus visualization that grows with meditation progress and includes lighting, particles, and orbit controls.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates growth, glow, and breathing effects based on total minutes, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers and outputs a recommended meditation type based on scoring.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and allows starting or deleting one through a carousel component.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe and button navigation and a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login status, guest mode, and provides logout or return-to-start actions while clearing cached queries on logout.
Provides top navigation with theme toggle, back button, session indicator, and mobile menu integration.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Simple wrapper that renders a toaster component with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing a retry-enabled wrapper for cloud write operations using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable countdown meditation timer with pause, seek, reset, duration updates, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend actor calls and guest-mode fallbacks, covering books, quotes, user profiles, journals, and rituals.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, OKLCH color themes, fonts, and custom animation utilities for the app's global styling.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books enriched with Amazon links and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured content and quizzes for meditation techniques, including descriptions and multi-page learning material.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays a swipeable carousel of book recommendations with theme toggle and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the main dashboard with quotes, meditation selection, rituals, and navigation to meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages journal entries with filtering, editing, favoriting, deletion, and import/export features.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Presents meditation knowledge categories, detailed technique content, and quizzes with score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page for configuring a meditation session with type, duration, ambient sound, mood, and guides, then starting a timer and optionally saving a ritual or journal entry.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress stats, rank, and visualizations with options to import/export data and handle cloud sync errors.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for future reflection features.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and utilities for retrieving sound objects and audio paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud sync error definitions and functions to map backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations with checks for readiness and authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization, validation, and normalization of export/import data for sessions, journals, progress, and rituals.
Stores and retrieves quiz scores in localStorage, supporting both guest and authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Implements a multi-phase lotus growth model mapping minutes to visual parameters and petal-layer openness. Provides smoothstep-based calculations for bloom geometry, particles, and maturity states.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Handles guest-mode meditation data in localStorage, including journal entries, progress, rituals, and legacy data migration. Provides CRUD utilities for guest-only storage.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes a string into a supported MeditationType, defaulting to mindfulness and treating 'meta' as 'metta'.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers for meditation progress and utilities to get current, next, and displayable rank info based on total minutes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, container settings, animations, and extended utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and requirements for fixing backend authenticated ritual deletion using field-matching without frontend changes.
